Nasdaq-listed IT major Cognizant has warned its employees that they could be fired for defying the diktat of returning to office even after repeated reminders, LiveMint reported.

articles.title: EPFO introduces auto claim settlement for education, marriage, housing - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Auto mode of claim settlement was introduced in April, 2020 for the purpose of advance for illness.
